name: Self-Hosted Media Server
description: A personal media server setup using Jellyfin, *Arr apps, Qbittorent and gluetun VPN to stream movies, TV shows, and music across devices.

name: Media Storage and Backup
description: A robust storage solution using a Raspberry Pi and external hard drives to store and back up media files, ensuring data safety and accessibility. Tools: openmediavault, plex, paperlessngx.

name: Game simulator
description: A game simulator setup using RetroPie on a Raspberry Pi and Dolphin to emulate classic gaming consoles, providing a nostalgic gaming experience.

name: Blog Website
description: A blog website using jekyll to share knowledge and experiences about home automation, DIY projects, and technology.
